m_szDocTitle: Science World Hydrogen Fuel Cell exhibit launch | Georgia Straight Vancouver's News & Entertainment Weekly
m_szDocSumamry: Science World Hydrogen Fuel Cell exhibit launch To Oct 31, 2017, 10 am–5 pm Price BUY TICKETS Website Science World’s new fun and interactive exhibit, presented by Hyundai, is launching, providing visitors of all ages a chance to experience first-hand the environmental benefits of the first zero-emissions hydrogen fuel cell vehicle available to Canadian customers. Based on a classic driving game, the Hyundai sponsored exhibit challenges drivers to take the hydrogen-powered Tucson Fuel Cell Electric Vehicle (FCEV) for a virtual spin.
